issues.title: Login fails on Safari
issues.description: Users on Safari 16 get 401 intermittently.

issues.title: Button misaligned on mobile
issues.description: CTA overlaps footer on 360px width.

issues.title: Password reset email not sent
issues.description: No email received after requesting password reset.

issues.title: Dark mode toggle not persisting
issues.description: Switching to dark mode resets after page reload.

issues.title: Profile picture upload fails
issues.description: Images larger than 2MB cause 500 error.

issues.title: Search results slow
issues.description: Queries take more than 5 seconds to return.

issues.title: Notifications not showing on iOS
issues.description: Push notifications never appear on iOS 17.

issues.title: Broken link on About page
issues.description: Contact link leads to 404.

issues.title: Checkout button unresponsive
issues.description: Clicking checkout doesn’t proceed to payment.

issues.title: Incorrect currency display
issues.description: Prices show in USD instead of EUR for EU users.

issues.title: Accessibility: missing alt text
issues.description: Images on homepage lack alt attributes.

issues.title: Analytics events not firing
issues.description: Page view events missing in GA4.

issues.title: Search bar autofocus broken
issues.description: Clicking search icon doesn’t focus input.

issues.title: Double email notifications
issues.description: Users receive duplicate emails on signup.

issues.title: Timezone conversion wrong
issues.description: Events show UTC instead of local time.

issues.title: Sidebar menu overlaps content
issues.description: On 1024px screens sidebar covers text.

issues.title: Export to CSV fails
issues.description: Large exports timeout after 30s.

issues.title: Image carousel not autoplaying
issues.description: Carousel stuck on first slide.

issues.title: Session timeout too short
issues.description: Users logged out after 5 minutes inactivity.

issues.title: Keyboard navigation broken
issues.description: Tabbing skips over input fields.

issues.title: Tooltip flickering
issues.description: Hover tooltip blinks on Chrome.

issues.title: User roles not saving
issues.description: Changes in admin panel don’t persist.

issues.title: Cache not invalidating
issues.description: Old data shown after update until refresh.

issues.title: Uncaught error on logout
issues.description: Console shows TypeError when logging out.

comments.body: Fails on PNGs above 1.5MB as well
